TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlObjectWriterException extends System.Xaml.XamlException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a XAML writer (such as the class) encounters an error while attempting to produce object graphs from a XAML node stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For cases where line information is available (such as when the XAML node stream was read by a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>), and for certain exception cases, a XamlObjectWriterException can report line information from the source of the XAML node stream. This information is appended to the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlException.Message%2A> and is also contained in <xref:System.Xaml.XamlException.LineNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlException.LinePosition%2A>. Each of these members is implemented by the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlException> base class of XamlObjectWriterException.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
